name: koconut
description: Promise-Friendly Kotlin style collection lib for nodejs.

scripts.build: ts-node ./commands/ClearTask.ts && babel ./lib --out-dir dist --extensions .ts,.tsx && tsc && echo Build Completed
scripts.test: echo Preparing Unit Test... && mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/unitTest/*.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.test:sequence: echo Preparing Unit Test... && mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/unitTest/*Sequence.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.validate: yarn test && ts-node ./decommandsv/DepreactedMethodValidatingTask.ts -f && echo Validating deprecation method completed.
scripts.distribute: yarn update && yarn build && yarn doc && yarn topic && yarn test && ts-node ./commands/DistributingTask.ts
